General.Name: Southport Acquisition Corp
General.Description: Southport Acquisition Corporation does not have significant operations. The company focuses on effecting a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses or assets. It intends to identify business opportunities in the field of financial software space with a focus on mortgage and real estate verticals. Southport Acquisition Corporation was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Del Mar, California.
General.Address: 1745 Grand Avenue, Del Mar, CA, United States, 92014
